documents.data:
[{
	organizationId: {{appsmith.store.organizationId}},
	id:{{this.params.mission.id}}
	createdAt: {{util.getMongoDbDate()}},
	updatedAt: {{util.getMongoDbDate()}},
	isDeleted: false,
	name: {{this.params.mission.name}},
	categoryId: {{this.params.mission.categoryId}},
	description: {{this.params.mission.description}},
	defaultTaskList: [],
difficultyLevel: {{this.params.mission.difficultyLevel}},
isTeamMission: {{this.params.mission.isTeamMission}},
levelRequirement: {{this.params.mission.levelRequirement}},
precedingMissionIdList: [],
reward: {{this.params.mission.reward}},
tagIdList: {{this.params.mission.tagIdList}},
isDailyMission: {{this.params.mission.isDailyMission}},
dailyMissionDate: { $date: {{this.params.mission.dailyMissionDate}} }
									}]
